name: Holy Gribbits
description:
OMG - There are Gribbits aboard our ship and they are multiplying Out-Of-Control. We're probably doomed but try to buy us some time.

GMTK GameJam  2020 entry. This game was developed in 48hrs. I wish I had more time to fine-tune and add additional features to this game. Maybe I'll get back to it in the future. Please enjoy and give any feedback for now and the future.

CONTROLS

  • Left-Mouse - Interact / Warp Gribbits                                                                                         
  • Right-Mouse - Place Gribbits (Only in Disposal Room)                                                            
  • On-Screen Buttons - Change Rooms / Send  In Repair Droid                                                
  •   Incinerator Controls - Destroy Gribbits in Disposal room. 

HOW TO PLAY

Grab up Gribbits with your mouse and dump them in the Disposal Room before they eat all the ship's essential systems, but remember you can only grab a limited number at a time. 

Use the buttons in the right hand panel to change between rooms and the lower left repair button to call  the repair droid into your current room to minimise damage.

Try to clear the Gribbits as quick as you can before they start eating the ship's systems. There is one essential system in each room except the Disposal Room.

TIPS

  • Try to cycle through the rooms quickly to keep the numbers down.
  • Wait until you have a few Gribbits in the Disposal before firing the incinerator.
  • Remember you can only have the droid repairing one system at a time, once he starts you'll have to wait until he has mostly repaired the system before he becomes free again.
  • Try not to let too many build up in one room or you'll have big troubles clearing them out.
  • HAVE FUN DELAYING THE INEVITABLE.

CREDITS

All programming, design and visuals developed by myself and my son.
